metadata.title: CVE-2021-4287 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, was found in ReFirmLabs binwalk up to 2.3.2. Affected is an unknown function of the filesrc/binwalk/modules/extractor.py of the component Archive ExtractionHandler. The manipulation leads to symlink following. It is possible tolaunch the attack remotely. Upgrading to version 2.3.3 is able to addressthis issue. The name of the patch isfa0c0bd59b8588814756942fe4cb5452e76c1dcd. It is recommended to upgrade theaffected component. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-216876.

criterions.comment: binwalk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
